title: Business Analyst
description:
WHO ARE WE?

iThink Logistics is one of India's best third-party logistic service providers. Awarded as Logistics Startup of the year by ET NOW leaders of tomorrow. We assist eCommerce Sellers in growing their businesses by effortlessly shipping products to customers' doorsteps in 26,000+ pin codes in India at the best possible price using courier service providers.







ABOUT JOB ROLE:

We are looking for a dedicated Business Analyst to join our organization. The ideal applicant will have a strong analytical mindset, excellent communication skills, experience in wireframing and the ability to transform business needs into actionable strategies.







Location: Malad East







REQUIREMENT:

Candidates having 1-2 years of experience.
Experience in Wireframing is must.
Familiarity with Figma.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Proficiency in creating technical documentation such as BRD, FRD, and workflow diagrams.
Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
Experience with process optimization and project monitoring.
Ability to work under pressure and manage multiple projects simultaneously.













RESPONSIBILITIES:




Use of Design Tools: Proficiency in wireframing with various tools and a basic understanding of Figma to support design collaboration.




Technical Documentation: Create and maintain clear and concise technical reports, activity diagrams, Business Requirement Documents (BRD), Functional Requirement Documents (FRD), and manuals to guide the team and stakeholders.




Develop Workflow Charts: Design and develop workflow charts to visualize system changes and improvements, ensuring clarity in understanding and implementing changes.




Project Monitoring & Process Optimization: Monitor the progress of projects, identify areas for improvement, and optimize workflows to ensure timely and efficient completion of tasks.




SPOC Coordination: Act as the Single Point of Contact (SPOC) between the Tech, Marketing, and other stakeholders, facilitating communication and ensuring alignment across teams.




Collaboration with Project Leaders: Work closely with project leaders to define project scope and vision, ensuring business goals are clearly understood and translated into actionable tasks.










PREFERRED SKILLS:

Ability to handle stress well.
Ability to multitask and prioritize tasks effectively in a fast-paced environment.
Prior logistics experience will be an added advantage.










LIFE AT ITHINK LOGISTICS:

Working at ITL goes far beyond just having a job to make ends meet. As an ITL team member, you may do what you love, be yourself, and make a difference in people's lives. We embody #squadgoals; our team takes pleasure in having a "curious attitude" that encourages cooperation and progress without regard for seniority. You will make new friends and be inspired to bring yours too.










WHAT IS IN IT FOR YOU:

Structured career development - our team of industry experts is here to support and work with you to explore your learning potential and career goals.
Paid leaves /Restricted Holidays / maternity / paternity leaves
Health insurance
Flexible working hours
Training and Development programs for personal and professional growth
